name: Squeeze
overview:
Squeeze is a game of strategy for both children and adults. You and your opponent each have a shape. The aim of the game is to squeeze your opponent out and to put as many of your shapes onto a board as possible. There are lots of different shapes and board sizes from which to choose and three levels to master.

You are able to go from a simple movement up, down or sideways to one which turns or flips the shapes. Squeeze encourages its players to visualise and to estimate how shapes relate to each other in a given space.
